data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Taucare-Rios, Andres, Brescovit, Antonio D. (2012): Description of the male, redescription of the female and new records of Odo patricius Simon, 1900 (Araneae: Zoridae). Zootaxa 3527: 79-82, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.208796
